lw3dge.graphics.shaders

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.shaders.ShaderProgram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StaticShader

    public abstract class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a basic ShaderProgram and all abstracted necessities Credit to ThinMatrix and his OpenGL Tutorials
    Author:
    Jared

    • Constructor Summary
